      • xpathOrNull

        public static java.lang.String xpathOrNull(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                           java.lang.String xp)
        Evaluate an XPath against a Document, returning a String.
        参数:
        doc - Document
        xp - XPath to evaluate against Document
        返回:
        String found at path or null
